definition: individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general

sentences.english: A heart with difficult negative mood, status of juvenile.
sentences.chinese: 真個此心終難負，況少年情緒。

sentences.english: Photos provide inspiration for the entire site design.
sentences.chinese: 圖片賦予了真個網站以靈感。

sentences.english: it is as if the train were holding its breath.
sentences.chinese: 好像真個列車都屏住了呼吸。

sentences.english: Water on the sides of the borehole will freeze, making it progressively smaller.
sentences.chinese: 鑽孔兩真個水一結冰，就讓它不停變小。

sentences.english: The whole management and organisation of this farm depend on us.
sentences.chinese: 我們負責真個莊園的管理和組織工作。
